key.name: sidebar-followed-sources-expanded
key.description: Whether the Followed Sources section in the sidebar is expanded

key.name: sidebar-popular-categories-expanded
key.description: Whether the Popular Categories section in the sidebar is expanded

key.name: window-width
key.description: The last saved width of the application window

key.name: window-height
key.description: The last saved height of the application window

key.name: window-maximized
key.description: Whether the application window is maximized

key.name: news-source
key.description: The currently selected news source (guardian, reddit, bbc, nytimes, wsj, bloomberg, reuters, npr, fox)

key.name: personalized-feed-enabled
key.description: Whether the personalized My Feed feature is enabled

key.name: myfeed-custom-only
key.summary: My Feed shows custom sources only
key.description: When true, My Feed will only show custom RSS sources, not built-in sources

key.name: user-location
key.description: User-provided location (city, region, ZIP code, or coordinates) for local news

key.name: user-location-city
key.description: Resolved canonical city name for the provided location (e.g., "San Francisco, California")

key.name: unread-badges-enabled
key.description: Whether unread count badges are displayed in the sidebar

key.name: unread-badges-categories
key.description: Whether unread count badges are shown on popular category items (e.g., World News, Technology)

key.name: unread-badges-special-categories
key.description: Whether unread count badges are shown on special categories (Front Page, Top Ten, My Feed, Local News, Saved)

key.name: unread-badges-sources
key.description: Whether unread count badges are shown on custom RSS feed sources

key.name: personalized-categories
key.description: List of category IDs included in the personalized feed

key.name: update-interval
key.description: How often to automatically refresh feeds ('manual', '15min', '30min', '1hour', '2hours', '4hours')
